${ModID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${ModID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a cost 1 or 0 card from your discard pile.

${ModID}:Bunker.NAME: Bunker
${ModID}:Bunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of next turn, add a *Golf *Ball into your hand.

${ModID}:GolfBall.NAME: Golf Ball
${ModID}:GolfBall.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to your unused Block. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Slapstick.NAME: Slapstick
${ModID}:Slapstick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle *Dramatic *Entrance, *Trip, or *Blind at random into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Ghost.NAME: Ghost
${ModID}:Ghost.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP each turn. NL Startup: Disguise this as another card in your deck.
